mapper.sql: album_id, album_name, release_time, album_img, voice, record_company, album_introduction, create_time
mapper.select: select ta.album_name as albumName, ta.release_time as releaseTime, ta.album_img as albumImg, ta.voice, ta.record_company as recordCompany, ta.album_introduction as albumIntroduction from tb_album ta where ta.album_id = #{albumId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_album (album_id, album_name, release_time, album_img, voice, record_company, album_introduction, create_time) values (#{albumId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{albumName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{albumImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{albumIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

album_id,

mapper.update:
update tb_album
album_name = #{albumName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
album_img = #{albumImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voice = #{voice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_company = #{recordCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
album_introduction = #{albumIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where album_id = #{albumId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
